Name: Tranject
About the game: Content In the year 20XX there was a soldier who executed an experiment for fighting a pollutant in space wich ended in desaster and endanged it even more. Now a scientist established a unit of explorers and fighters who have to clean it up as well as make it through the obstacles that may show up. Or let's call it solve conflicts. Tranject is a 2D - space - shooter with a complex story about cleaning space and collecting green essence. The base game as well as a possible expansion is developed by Jadon-K. Fischer. Tranject is 'made with Unity' Features 12-15 minutes for each operation! 14 different story missions ! 3 background missions in the past! 3 additional bonus deployments ! Partly random generated enemy waves! 12 unlockable specific ship abilities , weapons and skins ! 9 challenging bosses and some additional minibosses ! Over 50 dangerous foes! Diversified events ! Multi-perspective, ongoing story ! Explorable base with interesting dialogs and characters! Animated cutscenes! Pixel look in modern environment Several playthroughs in order to relive the game and expose secrets!
Meta Title: Tranject: Jan 1, 2020, Jadon-K. Fischer and Full Overview
